plot: This short written, directed and produced by Conrad Brooks with original music by Ruth Biedrzycki (Bederski) is told entirely in shadows.
title: Mystery in Shadows
plot_es: This short written, directed and produced by Conrad Brooks with original music by Ruth Biedrzycki (Bederski) is told entirely in shadows.
plot_en: This short written, directed and produced by Conrad Brooks with original music by Ruth Biedrzycki (Bederski) is told entirely in shadows.
